dct_title_s: Bartholomew's "half-inch to mile" map of Scotland
dct_alternative_sm: Bartholomew's new reduced survey for tourists & cyclists
dct_description_sm: the Edinburgh Geographical Institute ; John Bartholomew.
Cover title: Bartholomew's new reduced survey for tourists & cyclists, sheet 20, central Ross-shire.
Relief shown by gradient tints, form lines, and spot heights; depths shown by isolines.
In upper left margin: New series, sheet 20.
"Reduced ... from the new revised Ordnance Survey, with special local revision and correction to date of publication."
